title: WTF Happened to Dems: Election Night Wrap Up
description:
Subscribe for ad-free extended interviews at http://usefulidiots.substack.com

This week, Taibbi went down to Virginia to get Useful Idiot boots on the ground for the crucial election. Let’s just say it didn’t go as planned for Dems.
What does this mean for 2022? 2024? What caused the disastrous loss? Was it messaging? The candidate? Bernie and the progressives?
In our election wrap up, we cover it all, and if you’re hankering for more election coverage, see the full live election special here:

It’s a special election week edition of Useful Idiots. Check it out now.
And for an ad-free episode that supports independent journalists, click here.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
